metadata.title: CVE-2019-3847 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in moodle before versions 3.6.3, 3.5.5, 3.4.8 and3.1.17. Users with the "login as other users" capability (such asadministrators/managers) can access other users' Dashboards, but theJavaScript those other users may have added to their Dashboard was notbeing escaped when being viewed by the user logging in on their behalf.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
